def_cn: 极佳的;最优秀的;卓越的
def_en: If you describe something as superlative, you mean that it is extremely good.
If someone uses superlatives to describe something, they use adjectives and expressions which indicate that it is extremely good.

def_cn: (形容词或副词)最高级的
def_en: In grammar, the superlative form of an adjective or adverb is the form that indicates that something has more of a quality than anything else in a group. For example, 'biggest' is the superlative form of 'big'.
